Title: 41763 - # Nostalgic Gadgets That Are Still Great Today
Direction: 675 words. Explain that technology is constantly changing, but some gadgets never grow old. Then, list 4-8 gadgets that were used years ago that people still love using today, even if only for nostalgic reasons. Some ideas include Polaroid cameras, old-school gaming systems, the TalkBoy, etc. One of your gadgets should be over the head earphones so that you can include the client link naturally. Your audience is tech savvy individuals. Please try to link to other, non-competitor products throughout the article to make the Sony link less obvious.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: present day noise canceling earbuds
